metadata.dc:author: Quinteros Orrego, I
Astudillo del Río, M
metadata.dc:description: The odontogenic myxoma is an uncommon tumor of the jaws. It occurs mainly on posterior mandible and affecting patients aged between second and third decade. This paper calls about an unusual case on a 57 years-old female patient. It appeared after extraction of lower bicuspid tooth. It was enucleated by curettage and has developed no recurrence up to this date.
metadata.dc:title: Mixoma odontogénico: reporte de un caso.
[Odontogenic myxoma: report of a case].
